modName: PS CTA Ex - R18PN Shanoa Armor Color Variations
summary: PS ColorThatArmor usage example and proof of concept.  In-game swappable color variations of R18PN's Shanoa armor - 12 color variations included (Original color NOT included).
descriptionHtml:
[heading] This is WORKING proof of concept for
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54529/?]PS Color That Armor - Automated armor retexture color variation generator[/url]

And main example of how to use MASK to make color variations with CLUT tinting without ruining the gold decoration parts.

[color=yellow] SKSE required to swap [/color] armor colors during game [color=yellow] OR use console [/color]"player.additem ## 1" but subtract one off the ID (EX. ##13567 to ##13566) to get all colors at once.

[color=yellow] READ THIS - load order of "PCTA Shanoa.esp" must by LESS THAN 78 [/color]for the spell color swap to work.

[color=yellow] Original mod is NOT required [/color]but original color is NOT included

See Image section for fine texture control by using masks with ImageMagick

Texture control option codes (or look at images for how I control them) :[/heading]
#Red clut_Red.png -clut clut_Blue.png -clut
#Green clut_Green.png -clut clut_Yellow.png -clut
#Blue clut_Blue.png -clut clut_Red.png -clut
#Yellow clut_Yellow.png -clut clut_Green.png -clut
#Purple clut_Purple.png -clut clut_Orange.png -clut
#Magenta clut_Magenta.png -clut clut_Red.png -clut
#Orange clut_Orange.png -clut clut_LightSteelBlue.png -clut
#Light Green clut_YellowGreen.png -clut clut_Gold.png -clut
#Gold clut_Gold.png -clut clut_YellowGreen.png -clut
#Steek clut_LightSteelBlue.png -clut clut_Red.png -clut
#Black -modulate 100,0 -modulate 305,0
#White -modulate 305,0 -modulate 100,0

[heading] [color=yellow] Usage [/color] [/heading]
[color=yellow] - Getting the colored "PCTA ##" armors [/color]
Craft it from the smithing menu (***You can only craft PCTA 0***)

[color=yellow] - Switching colors of PCTA armors (OR convert between PCTA0 and original) [/color]
*** Each spell comes with "Forward" and "Reverse" which controls the direction of change
*** ONLY equipped armors that are selected in settings will switch colors
- Player Character : Use "PS CTA Color Change SELF ---" powers
[img] http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53925-2-1399751746.jpg [/img]
- NPC : Use "PS CTA Color Change TARGET ---" alteration spells
[img] http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53925-1-1399751745.jpg [/img]

[color=yellow] - Setting which armor pieces to change and/or by how much [/color]
- Use "PS CTA Color Change Setting" powers for BOTH PC and NPC
[img] http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53925-1-1399751901.jpg [/img]


[heading] --- Credit ---[/heading]
R18Pn 09 - Shanoa Armor for UNP CBBEV3 7B : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52431/?
author: oscarvonreuenthal
